author: John Timmer
title: In the UK, pandemic panic has people burning cell phone towers
description: Pressure of a pandemic brings old fears of new wireless tech into the open.
content:
1 with 1 posters participating
There's a long history of fears regarding wireless technology, based on vague accusations that it causes health issues and claims that some people are "electrosensitive." Those fears have been maintained by a handful of ambiguo… [+4989 chars]
